name: BurstProof Isolation Valve for Washing Machine or Dishwasher (single hose) 20mm
description:
This patented valve that is guaranteed to cut off water at the source if a flexible hose bursts in your home.
It detects an increase in water flow caused by the failure of an old or faulty hose. Water flow is cut right away, preventing damage to the home or unit. This valve only cuts the water to the affected hose that has burst leaving the dwellings water supply totally intact.
If the system is activated, to reset, you simply take the burst proof valve off the tap and it will rest automatically. Reinstall onto tap and reconnect the hose. It does not get any easier.
The system can be installed in new builds or easily retro fitted to existing plumbing.
category: BurstProof

name: BurstProof Loose Nut Isolation Valve for Mixer Taps 15mm
description:
This patented valve that is guaranteed to cut off water at the source if a flexible hose bursts in your home.
It detects an increase in water flow caused by the failure of an old or faulty hose. Water flow is cut right away, preventing damage to the home or unit. This valve only cuts the water to the affected hose that has burst leaving the dwellings water supply totally intact.
If the system is activated, to reset, you simply take the burst proof valve off the tap and it will rest automatically. Reinstall onto tap and reconnect the hose. It does not get any easier.
The system can be installed in new builds or easily retro fitted to existing plumbing.
The benefits are enormous as follows:
-
Plumbers do not need to install the restrictors into any mixer tap.
-
One less possible leak point in the plumbing.
-
For renovations such as body corporate or unit development they do not need to uninstall the tap anymore. Simply connect to our valve.
-
Much easier to install as it is just the valve for mixers.
category: BurstProof

name: BurstProof Loose Nut Isolation Valve for Toilet 15mm
description:
This patented valve that is guaranteed to cut off water at the source if a flexible hose bursts in your home.
It detects an increase in water flow caused by the failure of an old or faulty hose. Water flow is cut right away, preventing damage to the home or unit. This valve only cuts the water to the affected hose that has burst leaving the dwellings water supply totally intact.
If the system is activated, to reset, you simply take the burst proof valve off the tap and it will rest automatically. Reinstall onto tap and reconnect the hose. It does not get any easier.
The system can be installed in new builds or easily retro fitted to existing plumbing.
category: BurstProof

name: Venice Full Back to Wall Toilet Suite Extra Height
description:
Range topping toilet suite! Extra height pan – Fully Ambulant

Hygienic Turbo Flushing System with NANO-GLAZE Protection!  The Venice toilet suite is the best we have seen! The turbo flushing system will keep your toilet as fresh and clean as possible  and also with  the easy clean ‘Nanoglaze’ technology for a superior flush.  This toilet also comes with extra height to add functionality. Take a look at the video clip below of the Venice at work, we are sure it will impress you as much as it does us!

Hygienic Turbo Flushing System with NANO-GLAZE Protection

Universal adjustable Inlet Valve and Outlet Valve supplied with all suits and also available as a spare part.

Full Vitreous China Ceramic Suites.

4.5 / 3.0 Litre Dual Flush 4 Star Water Rating.

Easy removable cistern, can be unscrewed from pan. Pan fixing with screws and brackets supplied.

Standard set out of 140-200mm for back to wall suites.

Available ‘S’ or ‘P’ trap standard.
category: Bathrooms & Toilets > Toilet Suites > Back to Wall, Bathrooms & Toilets > Toilet Suites
